description: Microsoft is once again harassing Google Chrome users on Windows 10 and Windows 11 with popup desktop advertisements promoting Bing and its GPT-4 Bing Chat platform. [...]
title: Microsoft again bothers Chrome users with Bing popup ads in Windows

description: Researchers have demonstrated a new acoustic side-channel attack on keyboards that can deduce user input based on their typing patterns, even in poor conditions, such as environments with noise. [...]
title: New acoustic attack determines keystrokes from typing patterns
